events.message: The insured has filed a claim after their vehicle was involved in a rear-end collision at the traffic light on Main Street.
Claim was categorised under Auto Accident cluster after review of the incident description mentioning a car collision.
An insurance agent specializing in auto accident claims has been assigned to manage this case for effective follow-up.
The company has officially acknowledged receipt of the claim and informed the customer of the next procedural steps.
Request sent for the insured to provide the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates.
Customer submitted the requested police report, multiple photos evidencing the collision damage, and a repair shop invoice.
Investigation into the claim began with a review of submitted documents and a vehicle inspection appointment scheduled.
The investigation was completed confirming liability and verifying all documents were genuine and consistent.
A settlement offer was proposed to the insured covering vehicle repairs and related expenses as per policy terms.
Customer responded positively to the settlement offer expressing satisfaction with the speed and clarity of communication.
Claim was officially approved following customer acceptance of the proposed settlement terms from the insurer.
Payment for the approved settlement was issued to the insured's designated bank account to cover repair costs.
The claim case was formally closed with all required payments and documentations completed and confirmed.
All records related to this auto accident claim were archived in the system for future reference and audits.
